content:
Howdy!  Welcome to my personal website.
I am a Visiting Assistant Professor in the Marketing Department at the Kelley School of Business, Indiana University. My current research focuses on Business-to-Business Marketing, Sales Management, and Quantitative Marketing Strategy.
I received my Ph.D. in Business Administration (Marketing) from the Mays Business School, Texas A&M University, co-advised by Hari Sridhar (Texas A&M University) and Vikas Mittal (Rice University).
 Download my CV.-- Â
